channel.title: Comments on: Interview: the Klezmer Gentiles
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Max S.
item.dc:creator: Max S.
item.description: excellent piece, kells. these aspects of memory, heritage & memorialization underlie my own understanding of my jewish identity.
